ing: 3/4 (14.5 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
des: "Given to me by my friend Amanda, this is a variation of one she used to make at a restaurant. Delicious served on rice!"
ins: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium-high heat; cook the bananas in the hot oil until hot, 2 to 3 minutes. Stir the honey and black beans with the bananas; cook and stir another 2 to 3 minutes. Stir the lime juice and salt into the mixture. Pour the coconut milk over the mixture and stir. Allow the mixture to simmer until hot, about 5 minutes. Serve hot.
